 You can find the Twitch stream at:     
  https://twitch.tv/twitchplayspokemon  
                                        
 or by searching "TwitchPlaysPokemon".  
                                        
 Twitch Plays Pokemon got its start as a
 stream on Twitch in 2014. It has been  
 streaming non-stop ever since.         
                                        
 Game buttons are pressed via commands  
 sent through chat.
